There are $n$ different types of cards. There are $m$ decks of cards, and each deck has $n$ cards.  All the cards from all the decks are mixed together.

A person randomly selects $n$ cards from the mixed deck. What is the probability that they will select a card that matches the card they previously chose and memorized?

You have multiple decks of cards, each with a unique set of cards.  You draw a card, memorize it, and put it back. Then, a random card is drawn from the deck. What is the chance the drawn card matches the one you memorized?
